backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor managing sessions, events, scoreboard state, captions, and lifecycle operations such as starting, updating, and ending sessions.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that adds an empty captions list to old session records when upgrading stored session data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping specific product features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for all major frontend source files used across the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and theming for light and dark mode along with base styling overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React Router route tree and wraps all pages in the FootballLayout component.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Broadc: UI button component allowing broadcasters to toggle or retry microphone input with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Footba: Provides broadcaster-side game controls including opening a dialog to submit flag events tied to selected teams.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Microp: Displays microphone-related errors with guidance and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Permis: Shows camera access errors and offers a retry option for camera permissions.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Scoreb: Provides UI to edit team scores and roles and submit updates to the scoreboard.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Sessio: Shows the broadcast session code and allows copying it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/events/EventFeed: Displays a scrollable list of game events with timestamps and icons.
frontend/src/components/events/FlagAnnou: Shows a prominent overlay announcing a flag event for a specific team.
frontend/src/components/events/LatestEve: Temporarily displays the most recent event in an animated overlay.
frontend/src/components/layout/FootballL: Page layout with header, footer, branding, and social links for the app.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/Botto: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/OnCam: Renders an on-screen scoreboard overlay with team names, scores, and offense indicators.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/Score: Card-style wrapper providing consistent scoreboard UI structure with a title and optional icon.
frontend/src/components/system/Unsupport: Informs users their browser lacks required features for broadcasting and suggests alternatives.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerSub: Shows viewer captions or a warning when captions are unavailable.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerVid: Video player UI that renders live, waiting, or ended stream states and handles loading, errors, and retry using useViewerLiveStream.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBroadcasterSession: Manages broadcaster session lifecycle including generating session codes, starting sessions, setting team icons, and ending sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useBroadcastMediaStre: Combines video and optional audio tracks into a broadcast MediaStream and manages mic-enabled state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handles login and stored identity loading, and exposes identity state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrophone.ts: Controls microphone access, tracks support and errors, and manages audio stream lifecycle with start/stop and retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for session metadata, events, scoreboards, and mutations like startSession, setTeamIcons, and endSession.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionCode.ts: Stores and retrieves a session code in localStorage with helpers to set and clear it.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionLifecycle.t: Determines session lifecycle state based on metadata and loading status.
React hook wrapping Web Speech API to manage listening state, transcripts, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimedFlagOverlay.t: Manages timed display of unseen flag events with sessionStorage persistence and auto-dismiss.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewerLiveStream.t: Simulates viewer livestream connection state, tracking errors and retry logic for a video element.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, dark theme overrides, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/teamIcons.ts: Defines team icon metadata and helpers for retrieving icon info and scoreboard names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BroadcasterPage.tsx: Broadcaster control page handling camera, microphone, speech captions, scoreboard, and live session UI.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to broadcast or viewer join flows.
frontend/src/pages/ViewerJoinPage.tsx: Page for entering and validating a session code before navigating to a live viewer session.
frontend/src/pages/ViewerWatchPage.tsx: Viewer watch page that loads session data, events, scoreboard, captions, and renders the video player with overlays plus an event feed and subtitle toggle.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the appâ€™s current features, architectural notes, issues, and versioned metadata for the live streaming system.
